CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 33 Random terpolymers comprised of thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione , thiophene( T ) , and dithiophene ( 2T ) were synthesized by Yang and co-workers in which the crystallinity of terpolymers could be controlled by varying the compositions of T and 2T.

Let's think step by step.

1. thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione
This is the name of a specific material or terpolymer. It is a complex name that includes several rings and functional groups, including thieno, pyrido, g, thieno, isoquinoline, dione, thieno, and pyrido again. It is one entity and can be referred to as "thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione" or simply as "this terpolymer" or "the first material" in the context of the paragraph.

2. thiophene(T)
This is the name of one of the monomers used in the synthesis of the terpolymers. It is a simple name that refers to a specific type of ring, thiophene. It is one entity and can be referred to as "thiophene" or "monomer T" in the context of the paragraph.

3. dithiophene (2T)
This is the name of another monomer used in the synthesis of the terpolymers. It is similar to thiophene but includes two thiophene rings. It is one entity and can be referred to as "dithiophene" or "monomer 2T" in the context of the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione
2. thiophene (T)
3. dithiophene (2T)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to materials or monomers used in the synthesis.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione |
| thiophene (T) |
| dithiophene (2T) |

Paragraph: 33 Random terpolymers comprised of thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione , thiophene( T ) , and dithiophene ( 2T ) were synthesized by Yang and co-workers in which the crystallinity of terpolymers could be controlled by varying the compositions of T and 2T.

Let's think step by step.

1. thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione
   This is the name of a specific terpolymer. The property names in this compound name are:
   - thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline
   - dione

2. thiophene(T)
   This is the name of one of the monomers used in the synthesis of the terpolymers. The property name in this compound name is "thiophene".

3. dithiophene (2T)
   This is the name of another monomer used in the synthesis of the terpolymers. The property name in this compound name is "dithiophene".

4. crystallinity
   This is a property of the terpolymers, not a compound name.

The crystallinity of the terpolymers can be controlled by varying the compositions of thiophene(T) and dithiophene (2T).

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 33 Random terpolymers comprised of thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione , thiophene( T ) , and dithiophene ( 2T ) were synthesized by Yang and co-workers in which the crystallinity of terpolymers could be controlled by varying the compositions of T and 2T.

Let's think step by step.

1. "33 Random terpolymers" - This is a collective noun phrase referring to a group of 33 polymers, so it doesn't have a specific property value.
2. "thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione" - This is a chemical compound name, which is not a property value.
3. "thiophene(T)" and "dithiophene (2T)" - These are chemical compound names, which are not property values.
4. "crystallinity" - This is the property value being referred to in the paragraph. It is a quality or characteristic of a solid material in which the constituent particles are arranged in a regular repeating pattern. In this context, it refers to the degree of orderliness or regularity in the arrangement of the terpolymers' molecular structure.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
The property value mentioned in the paragraph is "crystallinity".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
